hDesciption: Gamebot is a bot coded by Laizo, it contains several playable games on Discord
hCommands:
```.help : allows to have the list of commands 
.*game* : allows to play a game of this *game* 
.*game* help : allows to have information about this *game*```
hCommandsAdmin:
```.help : allows to have the list of commands 
.*game* : allows to play a game of this *game* 
.*game* help : allows to have information about this *game* 
.pban *joueur* : prevents a player to play a game```
